title: Print, "Lion and Hare Composed of Ornamental Leaf-Work", 1698
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of the Estate of David Wolfe Bishop
description: A lion and a hare, both composed of ornamental leaf-work are present running in a barren landscape. The lion faces right, the hare left. Possibly a design for jewelry

exhibitions.title: Campana Brothers Select: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Lion and Hare Composed of Ornamental Leaf-Work", 1698.
1698. Engraving on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of the Estate of David Wolfe Bishop. 1957-162-13.
